channel.title: .CLASS file editing
channel.description: No I AM NOT FULL fking retard.... problem is : when i try to open .class file at my client (was .jar decompiled with 7zip and wrar...) it gives me strange writing with notepad++ and with notepad.. i tried using jedit but i couldn't add things there or edit things... (had editing on) and then i tried to use "DirtyJOE" and same thing everywhere......... if anyone could help me plz. help appreciated :D

item.title: .CLASS file editing
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“justus69, post:3, topic:476901”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=595065.msg4190623#msg4190623 date=1356749037]
You’re supposed to edit the .java files, not the .class files, the computer reads the .class files.
[/quote]
I am editing .jar client what i decompiled sooo… editing client.class…[/quote]To read a class file you cant use notepad or those things, you need a decompiler, i used to use jd gui you can try it.

Read full topic
